query.title: Drinkie Pinkie's Query Help!
query.author: Me, silly!
query.description: This bot allows for fully customisable scheduling of search queries from Derpibooru. This will essentially mean that on a per-guild basis, users can define what I search Derpibooru for, and control how frequently I post. I will go through all commands relating to this function and give an overview on what each do.

fields.Commands:
`!dpi settings query new <tag1>,<tag2>, <tag3>` - Will create a new schedule with your defined list. Note: each new query willcreate an associated default rotation, and can be changed by modifying the rotation (`dpi settings rotation edit <rotation_id> <cron>`). 
`!dpi settings query list` - Will provide a list of all current queries within the schedule. 
`!dpi settings query edit <query_id> <tag1>,<tag2>, <tag3>` - Will allow for the modification of a query. 
`!dpi settings query remove <query_id>` - Allows for the deletion of a query.

rotation.title: Drinkie Pinkie's Rotation Help!
rotation.author: Me, silly!
rotation.description: This bot allows for fully customisable scheduling of search queries from Derpibooru. This will essentially mean that on a per-guild basis, users can define what I search Derpibooru for, and control how frequently I post. I will go through all commands relating to this function and give an overview on what each do.

fields.Commands:
`!dpi settings rotation list` - Will provide a list of all current rotation timings within the schedule. 
`!dpi settings rotation edit <rotation_id> <timings>` - Will allow for the modification of a rotation.
fields.Introduction: This is necessary to explain how the rotation syntax works. The format of this rotation is very similar to a syntax used by a unix tool, called Cron. Here is an example - `2 4-6 5/10 4,8 *`. I will go through this.
fields.Example Explained:
`1st value (minutes [0-59]) - 2`: A single number is defined. Will run when the specified number time has been fully matched. Will post 2 minutes past the hour. 
`2nd value (hours [0-23]) - 4-6`: A range of numbers are defined. Will run when the specified number time is within the range. Will post every hour from 4 to 6am. 
`3rd value (days of month [1-31]) - 5/10`: Combination of multiples and a range of numbers. The first half represents the multiple value, which will only run if the number time fits within the multiple. The second half is a range, which defines what parts of the time are valid. Will post every 5th day, as long as the date is after the 10th of the month. 
`4th value (months [1-12]) - 4,8`: Multiple numbers are defined. Will run when one of the listed specified number times have been fully matched. Will post on April & August. 
`5th value (days of week [1-7]) - *`: Wildcard value, will run for every value. In this case, will post on any day of week.
fields.External Help: If you're still confused, then contact this fella on Discord: Ponka#3440. Or try googling about Cron it might help since it can probably explain better.

prompts.title: Drinkie Pinkie's Prompts Help!
prompts.author: Me, silly!
prompts.description: This bot allows you to insert your own custom prompts which can be guessed by others, and unique depending on who is saying the prompt!

fields.Commands: `!dpi msg` - This command will have me send you a message for you to privately send your new prompt to me. Not sure how to do that? I'll show an example and explain that!
fields.Example: Here is an example prompt (which doesn't work lol): `p: "EXAMPLE time!"; r|"everyone": "heck yeah!!! I GIVE THE BEST EXAMPLES",, r|"user": "examples with you!",, r|"bot": "examples for you tulpies!",, r|"113460834692268032": "specific example with creator"`
fields.Example Explained:
`1st value (p: "...";)` - Defines the prompt. Accepted characters (lowercase/uppercase/numbers/.,?!#$%). 
`2nd value (r|"<entity>":)` - Defines which statement to give depending on which group is defined. Users are: everyone:all members, user:non-bot, bot:bot members (tulpas), specific user/bot (id for user, name for bot) 
`3rd value ("...",,)` - Defines the response of the group specified, accepted characters are same as first value. Note: only use ,, if defining multiple different groups with values.

general.title: Drinkie Pinkie's Help!
general.author: Me, silly!
general.description: Here are the current things I do~

fields.Commands:
`!dpi img <tag1>,<tag2>, <tag3>` - Grabs a random image from Derpibooru with the tags you specify! 
`!dpi random <number>` - Random number is selected between 1 - 10, if your number equals the random number generated, you will learn another way to mention me, the drinkie. 
`!dpi game tictactoe <user>` - Play a game of tictactoe with a user you mention! 
`!dpi dailyponk <type> (day|bonus) <value> (date [d/m/yyyy]|index)` - Using your value, will find the relevant daily ponk for that day! [Bonuses are on the following - 11/10/2019 (60), 12/10/2019 (61), 28/10/2019 (77), 31/10/2019 (80), 2/11/2019 (82), 8/11/2019 (88), 9/11/2019 (89), 21/3/2020 (222)] 
`!dpi source` - Check the source code for Drinkie! (plz don't roast too hard)
fields.Guides:
`!dpi help query` - Provides commands, along with information regarding controlling image queries that I search for! 
`!dpi help rotation` - Provides commands, along with information regarding timings for when images that I search are posted! 
`!dpi help prompts` - Provides some help, along with context for adding new prompts to be guessed.
fields.Functions:
- Grabs the ##毎日ピンキーパイ from KurogeWaPony! 
- Customisable, guild-focused Derpibooru image posting scheduler (see help for query/rotation)! 
- Try mentioning me specifically, you may be surprised! 
- More to come??? (!!!)
